DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate analgesic efficacy oxycodone fentanyl treatment postoperative pain laparoscopic cholecystectomy .

DOC.criteria: Planned outpatient laparoscopic cholecystectomy > 18 year Intolerance study drug Treatment MAO inhibitor
